turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a cafe mocha from the Starbucks at 123 Main Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a grande with 2% mill canoe whip cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a grande cafe mocha, 2% milk and no whipped cream. correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at 123 main street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
